1.title: Bank error in your favor. Collect £200.

3.title: From sale of stock you get £50.

5.title: Go to Jail. Go directly to jail. Do not pass Go, Do not collect £200.

6.title: Grand Opera Night. Collect £50 from every player for opening night seats.

9.title: It is your birthday. Collect £10 from every player.

14.title: You are assessed for street repairs: Pay £40 per house and £115 per hotel you own.

15.title: You have won second prize in a beauty contest. Collect £10.
